title: JSON-LD uplift tutorial
context:
# See https://opengeospatial.github.io/ogc-na-tools/tutorials/#how-to-create-a-json-ld-uplift-context-definition

transform:
  - '[to_entries | .[] | {"@id": .key} + .value]'
  - '[.[] | .author = {"name": .author}]'

types:
  '$..author': 'Person'

base: 'http://example.com/job/'

context:
  '$':
    '@base': 'http://example.com/job/'
    rdfs: 'http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#'
    foaf: 'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/'
    dc: 'http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/'
    statusvoc: 'http://example.com/status#'
    label: 'rdfs:label'
    author: 'dc:creator'
    name: 'foaf:name'
    Person: 'foaf:person'
    status:
      '@id': 'statusvoc:status'
      '@type': '@vocab'
      '@context':
        '@vocab': 'http://example.com/status#'

title: OGC Bodies (sample)
context:
transform:
  # Detect DWG and SWG from name
  - >-
    [.[] | . + (
      if .name | test("\\bDWG\\b") 
        then {"type": "policy:Dwg"} 
        else (
          if .name | test("\\bSWG\\b")
            then {"type": "policy:Swg"} 
            else {"type": "policy:Body"}
          end)
        end)]
  # Create @id from id, add inScheme and alias label to name
  - '[.[] | . + {"@id" : ("bodies:" + .id), "inScheme": "http://www.opengis.net/def/entities/bodies", "label": .name}]'

types:
  '$[*]':
    - skos:Concept

context:
  '$':
    bodies: 'http://www.opengis.net/def/entities/bodies/'
    skos: 'http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#'
    rdfs: 'http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#'
    policy: 'http://www.opengis.net/def/metamodel/ogc-na/'
    inScheme:
      "@id": "skos:inScheme"
      "@type": "@id"
    name: skos:prefLabel
    label: rdfs:label
    type: "@type"
content:
[
  {
    "id":"673",
    "name":"3D GeoVolumes SWG",
    "abbv":"3DGeoVol SWG",
    "fname":"Jeff",
    "lname":"Harrison",
    "org":"US Army Geospatial Center",
    "status":"Active"
  },
  {
    "id":"472",
    "name":"Agriculture DWG",
    "abbv":"Agriculture DWG",
    "fname":"Joshua",
    "lname":"Lieberman",
    "org":"Harvard University",
    "status":"Active"
  },
  {
    "id":"131",
    "name":"Architecture DWG",
    "abbv":"Arch DWG",
    "fname":"Gobe",
    "lname":"Hobona",
    "org":"Open Geospatial Consortium, Inc.",
    "status":"Active"
  },
  {
    "id":"615",
    "name":"Artificial Intelligence in Geoinformatics DWG",
    "abbv":"GeoAI DWG",
    "fname":"Scott",
    "lname":"Simmons",
    "org":"Open Geospatial Consortium, Inc.",
    "status":"Active"
  }
]

title: OGC Bodies (full)
context:
transform:
  # Detect DWG and SWG from name
  - >-
    [.[] | . + (
      if .name | test("\\bDWG\\b") 
        then {"type": "policy:Dwg"} 
        else (
          if .name | test("\\bSWG\\b")
            then {"type": "policy:Swg"} 
            else {"type": "policy:Body"}
          end)
        end)]
  # Create @id from id, add inScheme and alias label to name
  - '[.[] | . + {"@id" : ("bodies:" + .id), "inScheme": "http://www.opengis.net/def/entities/bodies", "label": .name}]'

types:
  '$[*]':
    - skos:Concept

context:
  '$':
    bodies: 'http://www.opengis.net/def/entities/bodies/'
    skos: 'http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#'
    rdfs: 'http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#'
    policy: 'http://www.opengis.net/def/metamodel/ogc-na/'
    inScheme:
      "@id": "skos:inScheme"
      "@type": "@id"
    name: skos:prefLabel
    label: rdfs:label
    type: "@type"
